item.title: Reverse Engineering VK Long Poll: Building a Sniffer, Discovering Hidden Events, and WebSocket Mysteries
item.description: A deep dive into how VK’s Long Poll works, building a sniffer to intercept events, and discovering undocumented event codes.

item.title: VKify — Extension for VKontakte
item.description: VKify is a browser extension that makes VKontakte more convenient: ad blocking, interface customization, privacy mode, and much more.

item.title: CodeSqueeze — Online Code Minifier
item.description: CodeSqueeze is a modern web tool for minifying HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, focused on speed, privacy, and a comfortable in-browser workflow.
